threads.title: create DMG on Higt Sierra APFS
threads.message: Is there any way to create DMG file for Higt Sierra formated with APFS? I alwasys use DMG for Sierra and Capitan, but cannot create DMG for Higt Sierra apfs.

threads.title: create DMG on Higt Sierra APFS
threads.message: why do you need to?? burn the high Sierra image to a USB disk using DIskMaker x 7. format the SSD as Mac OS Extended then high Sierra will automatically convert to APFS during installation.

threads.title: create DMG on Higt Sierra APFS
threads.message: Because install higt Sierra this way are 30 minutes. If have DMG are 90 seconds. I always do that for other OS X. So I am asking if there is way to create DMG. I know that with USB is possible.
